name: ruff-action
description: A GitHub Action to run Ruff, an extremely fast Python linter and code formatter.

scripts.package: ncc build -o dist/ruff-action src/ruff-action.ts && ncc build -o dist/update-known-checksums src/update-known-checksums.ts
scripts.act: act pull_request -W .github/workflows/test.yml --container-architecture linux/amd64 -s GITHUB_TOKEN="$(gh auth token)"
scripts.update-known-checksums: RUNNER_TEMP=known_checksums node dist/update-known-checksums/index.js src/download/checksum/known-checksums.ts "$(gh auth token)"
scripts.all: npm install && npm run build && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run package

author: @eifinger
